calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard.DifferentPattern
this method returns the points scored according to the different (all three of the special symbol) pattern objective card it iterates throughout all the player's manuscript and finds the given symbols of the objective card
calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard.DoublePattern
this method returns the points scored according to the double symbol pattern objective card it iterates throughout all the player's manuscript and finds the given symbol of the objective card

calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard.ObjectiveCard
method to be implemented and overridden by a concrete class, which calculates the points earned by achieving the objective, based on the given manuscript
calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard.ThreeKingdomPattern
this method returns the points scored according to the three kingdom (three of the same basic symbol) pattern objective card it iterates throughout all the player's manuscript and finds the given symbol of the objective card

this method returns the points scored according to the two plus one pattern (L shaped) objective card it iterates throughout all the player's manuscript and finds the given pattern of the objective card

ClientManuscript - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.ClientClass
The ClientManuscript interface provides methods for accessing and manipulating manuscript data, including counters of any Corner Symbol, placements, the manuscript field and the vertical and horizontal maximum extension of the manuscript
ClientMarket - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.ClientClass
The ClientMarket interface provides methods for accessing the market data, therefore face-up cards, resource deck, gold deck, and common objectives.
ClientPlayer - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.ClientClass
The ClientPlayer interface provides methods for accessing player-related data, including player state, pawn colour, manuscript, objectives, username, hand, and starter card.
